awards.description: THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF LARSEN BAY IN BUILDING CAPACITY AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  TASKS INCLUDE MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND PROGRAM; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING WITH OTHER AGENCIES, CONDUCTING OUTREACH AND CLEAN-UP EVENTS; CONDUCTING SOURCE SEPARATION AND RESOURCE RECOVERY ACTIVITIES; BUILDING KNOWLEDGE OF AIR, WATER, AND WEATHER, UPDATING THE INVENTORY, AND COLLECTING BASELINE OCEAN WATER QUALITY DATA. .

DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF LARSEN BAY IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3) BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4. BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5. BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES AND CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; CONDUCTING SOURCE SEPARATION AND RESOURCE RECOVERY ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF AIR AND WATER QUALITY; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; DEVELOPING A CONTAMINATED SITE CLEANUP PLAN, AND COLLECTING BASELINE OCEAN WATER QUALITY AND HARMFUL ALGAL BLOOM DATA.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF LARSEN BAY, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; FINANCIAL REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; RECYCLING AND WASTE REPORTS; AND A CONTAMINATED SITE CLEANUP PLAN.
